channel.title: Ayshei
channel.description: Your one-stop shop for the latest fashion items

item.g:title: e World Dual LCD LED Monitor Desk Mount Stand with C-clamp and Bolt-Through Grommet Options - Heavy Duty Fully Adjustable Monitor Mount with Arms - Hold Two (2) Screens up to 27" (Black).
item.g:description: About this itemPREMIUM QUALITY - The dual monitor mount is made of heavy-duty steel to support up to 17. 6 lbs. per arm. Compatible with most 13-27” screens with VESA patterns 75x75 and 100x100mm. Please verify VESA pattern of your screen before purchase. ARTICULATION & HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT - Enjoy comfortable viewing angles with +45° to -45° tilt, 180° swivel, 360° rotation, and height adjustment along the center pole. Monitors can be placed in portrait or landscape orientation. FITS 13" TO 27" SCREENS - Dual monitor mount fitting most screens 13” to 27” in size and up to 17. 6 lbs. in weight (each) with VESA 75x75mm or 100x100mm hole patterns. Mounts to your desk with heavy duty C-clamp fitting desks from 0. 4” to 3. 3” in thickness. HEAVY DUTY & EASY INSTALLATION - Mounts to the back of your desk (up to 3. 25” thick) via a heavy-duty C-clamp or optional grommet mount. Mounting your monitors is a simple process with detachable VESA bracket plates. We provide the hardware and easy-to-follow instructions for assembly. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We believe in the quality of our monitor mount and satisfaction of our customers is our top priority. If you are not happy with our dual monitor arm stand for any reason, Please feel free to contact us to get a FULL REFUND.

item.g:title: e World Large Gaming Mouse Pad with Stitched Edges - Pack of 1 31.5 x 11.8 in Minimalist Topographic Map Desk Mat - Extended XL Mousepad with Anti-Slip Base, Cool Desk Pad for Keyboard and Mouse. (1)
item.g:description: About this itemPREMIUM QUALITY - This aesthetic and durable white mouse pad with our unique design is a decent gift for you and your loved ones; ideal for gamers; graphic designers, or anyone who uses a mouse for long sessions. EXTENDED LARGE SIZE - Measures 31. 5 x 11. 8 x 0. 12 inches (800 x 300 x 3 mm); this full desk mousepad accommodates a mouse, a full-size mechanical keyboard and other desk items. ULTRA-SMOOTH SURFACE - Eworld extended mouse pad features a smooth, comfortable micro-woven polyester cloth surface with a fine weave for effortless, silent gliding. NON-SLIP RUBBER BASE - This minimalist mouse pad gaming is made of soft and dense rubber with non-slip texture on the back side; together, the texture and thickness keep the desk mouse pad always firmly in place. Washable & Portable Water-resistant surface makes the computer mouse pad easy to wipe clean; each computer mat for desk from our brand comes with a drawstring pocket for you to carry it. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We believe in the quality of our desk pad and satisfaction of our customers is our top priority. If you are not happy with our mouse pad for any reason, Please feel free to contact us to get a FULL REFUND. Technical DetailsManufacturer ‎e world unbox jappinessBrand ‎e world unbox happinessProduct Dimensions ‎79 x 30 x 0. 1 cm; 500 gColor ‎whiteShape ‎RectangularMaterial Type ‎PolyesterNumber of Items ‎1Size ‎LargeManufacturer Part Number ‎ew-dp1Item Weight ‎500 g

item.g:title: e World Mini Projector – Smart 4K Projector Supports Android - Smart Projector 5G Bluetooth 5.0 - Mini Projector Full HD 1080P - Auto Horizontal Trapezoid, LED Projector 180° Rotatable (UK Plug).
item.g:description: About this itemLARGE 180° ROTATING PROJECTOR - This intelligent projector has a 180° rotating design and can direct the 180° inclined projector in all directions, including the ceiling. You can point the projector at the ceiling of the bedroom and then place it on the bed to watch the film. It can provide clear images on 40-200 inch screens. Can create a very large picture in your room. ANDROID 11 & BUILT-IN DUAL FREQUENCY WI-FI 6 - This portable mini projector has a built-in 5G + 2. 4G WI-Fi 6. Wife 6 offers you a smoother online video experience without delay. This means that the projection will be faster and more reliable. With Android 11, no matter where you go, you can watch movies or presentations on your favorite platform. It is not necessary to buy additional TV boxes. It is very suitable for outdoor activitiesBLUETOOTH 5. 0 & SPEAKER - This mini WiFi projector has built-in 5W stereo speakers with a HiFi system that provides an excellent listening experience: ultra-clear and powerful sound. So you don't need to buy additional speakers. You can enjoy the family drama with your family. This projector is also equipped with Bluetooth 5. 0 and can support a stable connection to various Bluetooth speakers. 4K SUPPORT & HORIZONTAL AUTOMATIC KEYSTONE CORRECTION - This native 720P high-resolution mini projector supports 1080p 4K, with impressive image quality, good brightness of 8000 lumens and a contrast of 10000:1. This can give you a good picture. The projector offers automatic horizontal key correction and manual keystone correction, so you can easily adjust trapezoidal images with the right scale and angle. SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – We believe in the quality of our smart projector and satisfaction of our customers is our top priority. If you are not happy with our HD projector for any reason, Please feel free to contact us to get a FULL REFUND. Technical DetailsBrand ‎e world unbox happinessProduct Dimensions ‎9 x 12 x 19 cm; 860 gManufacturer ‎e world unbox happinessForm Factor ‎PortableScreen Resolution ‎1920 x 1080Resolution ‎1920 x 1080Are Batteries Included ‎NoItem Weight ‎860 g

item.g:title: Apple IPhone 16 Pro Max (512 GB) - Natural Titanium - HK Version - Dual Sim
item.g:description: Non-returnableAbout this itemSTUNNING TITANIUM DESIGN—iPhone 16 Pro Max has a strong and light titanium design with a larger 6. 9-inch Super Retina XDR display. It’s remarkably durable with the latest-generation Ceramic Shield material that’s 2x tougher than any smartphone glass. TAKE TOTAL CAMERA CONTROL—Camera Control gives you an easier way to quickly access camera tools, like zoom or depth of field, so you can take the perfect shot in record time. MAGNIFICENT SHOTS—Thanks to a more advanced 48MP Ultra Wide camera, you can capture mesmerizing detail in macro and sweeping, wide-angle photos. Want sharper shots from farther away? The 5x Telephoto camera makes it easy. PRO VIDEO—Take your videos a whole new level with 4K 120 fps Dolby Vision—enabled by the 48MP Fusion camera—and studio-quality mics for higher-quality audio recording. A Pro studio in your pocket. PHOTOGRAPHIC STYLES—The latest-generation Photographic Styles give you greater creative flexibility, so you can make every photo even more you. And thanks to advances in the image pipeline, you can now reverse any style, any time. THE POWER OF A18 PRO—A18 Pro chip enables advanced photo and video features like Camera Control, and delivers exceptional graphics performance for AAA gaming. A HUGE LEAP IN BATTERY LIFE—iPhone 16 Pro Max delivers an incredibly power-efficient performance with up to 33 hours video playback. Charge via USB-C or snap on a MagSafe charger for faster wireless charging. CUSTOMIZE YOUR IPHONE—With iOS 18 you can tint your Home Screen icons with any color. Find your favorite shots faster in the redesigned Photos app. And add playful, animated effects to any word, phrase, or emoji in iMessage. VITAL SAFETY FEATURES—With Crash Detection, iPhone can detect a severe car crash and call for help if you can’t. MYWP3

item.g:title: EOS 250D DSLR Camera With EFS 18-55 DC III Lens 24.1 MP APS-C Sensor 5 FPS Vari-Angle Touchscreen 4K Movies Wi-Fi Bluetooth
item.g:description: HighlightsA super-portable DSLR that’s fun and simple to use whatever you’re shooting، delivering excellent results. A versatile EF-S 18-55mm f/3. 5-5. 6 III lens lets you photograph everything from portraits to landscapes with the same lens. A 24. 1-megapixel APS-C sized sensor works alongside a DIGIC 8 image processor to deliver superb image quality، even in low-light conditions. 4K movies look superb played back on your home TV or smart device. 4K Frame Grab extracts photos from your movies، while 4K time-lapse turns hours into seconds. A Vari-Angle touchscreen makes it easy to shoot from unusual angles، whilst Dual Pixel CMOS AF focuses quickly and accurately when shooting in Live View mode. Share images via your smart device by linking it to the EOS 250D with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. Wireless camera control is possible using the Canon Camera Remote app. OverviewThis highly portable DSLR camera is a great option for stepping up your photography from a smartphone or compact camera. You can capture 24. 1 megapixel photos and 4K movies that are pin-sharp and packed with colour. Easy and enjoyable to use، the EOS 250D lets budding photographers take a more creative approach to capturing interesting scenery and life’s big moments، and as the world’s lightest DSLR with a moveable screen، the EOS 250D is a camera you can take everywhere. The included EFS 18-55mm f/3. 5-5. 6 III zoom lens is versatile enough for everyday shots of people and places، and its compact lightweight design makes it perfect for travel. Inside its portable body، the EOS 250D features a 24. 1-megapixel sensor and a DIGIC 8 image processor for superb results on the move. An optical viewfinder gives a clear، real-time view of the world. With a Vari-Angle touchscreen، you can shoot at more creative angles، using the Guided User Interface to help you learn how to achieve the best results. You can spread the fun and easily share your images with friends and family، just link the EOS 250D to your smartphone or tablet computer using Bluetooth and the camera’s built-in Wi-Fi will take care of the rest. SpecificationsExpandable Memory TypeSDProduct Weight449 gScreen Size3 inColour NameBlackBattery TypeLithium IonView Finder TypeOpticalSensor TypeCMOSAutofocusYesProduct Length122 mmProduct Height69. 8 mmProduct Width/Depth92. 6 mmCamera Resolution24. 1 MPFeaturesHD Movie Mode, Rechargeable Battery, Wi-Fi enabled, Wi-Fi enabledModel NumberEOS 250DModel NameEOS 250DInbuilt FlashyesZoomyesInterchangeable LensyesImage StabilizationyesMax Shutter Speed30/1/4000/secondAperturef_5_6
